titleStmt.title: A duell betvveen a Iesuite and a Dominican, begun at Paris, gallantly fought at Madrid, and victoriously ended at London, upon fryday the 16 day of May, Anno Dom. 1651. / by Thomas Gage, alias the English American, now preacher of the word at Deal in Kent.
titleStmt.author: Gage, Thomas, 1603?-1656.

publicationStmt.publisher: for Tho. Williams dwelling at the Bible in little Brittain,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
